MemoryInfobox.description: 'Villagers taken as Slavery|slaves by Spartans often had their valuables stolen and hidden until the Spartans could retrieve them for their own use. Kassandra found a letter detailing a hiding spot.'

General_Description: '''Property''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On the corpse of a [[Sparta]]n soldier, Kassandra discovered a note detailing the location of the soldier's valuables.
Section_Messages: *''The villagers are hard workers and will make good [[Slavery|slaves]]. I removed their valuables and hid them in a cache just outside the village. Bring it to the camp.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found the location and claimed the valuables for herself.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
